meshdata.comment: Velocity data from mesh-data file (CSV or binary)

magnitude.comment: Selects velocity magnitude (using inlet direction) when available in the input data (default=true)

initialtime.comment: Defines the initial time of mesh data (default=0)

timeloop.comment: Defines the loop by start and end time (default=0,0)

setpos.comment: Applies a position offset to the mesh data (default=0,0,0)

setvelmul.comment: Multiply fixed value to velocity data (default=1,1,1)

setveladd.comment: Add fixed value to velocity data (default=0,0,0)
